title: ICYMI - Ta-Nehisi Coates Discusses "We Were Eight Years in Power" and Why Obama Was Different
itunes:title: ICYMI - Ta-Nehisi Coates Discusses "We Were Eight Years in Power" and Why Obama Was Different
description:
Ta-Nehisi Coates talks about his book of Atlantic essays "We Were Eight Years in Power" and weighs in on going from Barack Obama to Donald Trump inside the White House.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
